text: Maurice Cheeks was officially introduced as the 21st head coach of the 76ers. Cheeks, who played for the Sixers for 11 seasons and served as an assistant coach for seven, was named coach after Jim O'Brien was relieved of his coaching duties.
title: Sixers Hire Maurice Cheeks as Head Coach.
